Texts.Chs:
一个装满血的圣杯，来自一场可怕的仪式。设计者: ^orange;Synniebun^reset;，^orange;Izuna^reset;和^orange;Koshi
^cyan;+^white;20% ^cyan;HP ^gray;(^white;持续90s^gray;), ^green;治疗^white;60点生命值^gray;(^white;2s内^gray;), ^green;治疗^white;200.2%^green;HP^gray;(^white;3m内^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
A Chalice full of blood from a terrible ritual devised by ^orange;Synniebun^reset;, ^orange;Izuna^reset;, and ^orange;Koshi^reset;.
^cyan;+^white;20% ^cyan;HP ^gray;(^white;90s^gray;), ^green;Heal ^white;60 ^gray;(^white;2s^gray;), ^green;Heal ^white;200.2% ^green;HP ^gray;(^white;3m^gray;)^reset;
